explains: n. 满足，令人喜悦的事物

sentences.en: "Gratification" and "gratitude" have the same etymological root.
The lords and doctors manifested their gratification also.
sentences.cn: 勋爵和医生们也表达了他们的喜悦。

sentences.en: A feed will usually provide instant gratification to a crying baby.
sentences.cn: 喂食通常可使正在哭闹的婴儿立即得到满足。
